content.body: FYI, waldemar has approved the PR to https://github.com/tc39/proposal-async-explicit-resource-management that adds the cover for `await using`, which satisfies the condition for Stage 3 advancement.

content.body: I will update the Stage in the explained and spec text tomorrow, and will start the process of merging the async and sync proposals this week.
